google_google_organization_iam_binding.description: Allows management of a single binding with an IAM policy for a Google Cloud Platform Organization.

org_id.description: The numeric ID of the organization in which you want to create a custom role.

role.description: The role that should be applied. Only one

members.description: A list of users that the role should apply to. For more details on format and restrictions see https://cloud.google.com/billing/reference/rest/v1/Policy#Binding

etag.description: (Computed) The etag of the organization's IAM policy.
